text:
Of all the phases of a woman's life, being a mother is special. With the roll out of the #Covid19 #vaccine, the question in mind; is “The Covid-19 Vaccine Safe For Pregnant Women?”

We have Dr. Shilpa Nambiar, PCMC Consultant O&G to answer your questions.

#PCMCdoctors
#IWD21 https://t.co/U94aUwRF4Q
